MLModels.description: A list of machine learning models.

value.description: A list of machine learning models.

CreateMLModelRequest.description: Create machine learning model request payload.

displayName.description: The machine learning model display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.

description.description: The machine learning model description. Maximum length is 256 characters.

folderId.description: The folder ID. If not specified or null, the machine learning model is created with the workspace as its folder.

UpdateMLModelDefinitionRequest.description: Update machine learning model public definition request payload.

MLModelDefinitionResponse.description: Machine learning model public definition response.

MLModelDefinition.description: Machine learning model public definition object.

format.description: The format of the item definition.

MLModelDefinitionPart.description: Machine learning model definition part object.

path.description: The machine learning model part path.

payload.description: The machine learning model part payload.

description.description: The machine learning model description. Maximum length is 256 characters.

MLModelEndpoint.description: A machine learning model endpoint object.

defaultVersionName.description: Default machine learning model endpoint version name.

EndpointDefaultVersionConfigurationPolic.description: The default version assignment behavior of a given machine learning model endpoint. Additional EndpointDefaultVersionConfigurationPolicy types may be added over time.

values.description: The default version is statically configured.
No default version has been configured.

value.description: The information about all versions available as endpoint for this MLModel.

MLModelEndpointVersionInfo.description: Machine Learning Model Endpoint version information.

versionName.description: The machine learning model version name

inputSignature.description: The input signature for this version of the machine learning model.

outputSignature.description: The output signature for this version of the machine learning model.

required.description: The boolean value to indicate if the signature is required or no. True - Required, False - Not Required.

MLModelEndpointVersionStatus.description: The status of a given machine learning model endpoint version. Additional ModelEndpointVersionStatus types may be added over time.

values.description: Machine learning model endpoint activation is under progress.
Machine learning model endpoint deactivation is in progress.
Machine learning model endpoint is available to serve score requests.
Machine learning model endpoint is in failed state.

ScoreDataRequest.description: Machine learning model endpoint request to score the given input data.

inputs.description: Machine learning inputs to score in the form of Pandas dataset arrays that can include strings, numbers, integers and booleans.

items.description: Machine learning inputs to score in the form of Pandas dataset arrays that can include strings, numbers, integers and booleans.
Machine learning inputs to score in the form of Pandas dataset arrays that can include strings, numbers, integers and booleans.

ScoreDataResponse.description: Machine learning model endpoint response to score the given input data.

predictions.description: Machine learning predictions represented in the form of Pandas dataset arrays that can include strings, numbers, integers and booleans.

items.description: Machine learning predictions represented in the form of Pandas dataset arrays that can include strings, numbers, integers and booleans.
Machine learning predictions represented in the form of Pandas dataset arrays that can include strings, numbers, integers and booleans.

UpdateMLModelEndpointRequest.description: Machine learning model endpoint request body to update Model Endpoint properties.

defaultVersionName.description: Default machine learning model endpoint version name.

UpdateMLModelEndpointVersionRequest.description: Machine learning model endpoint version configuration info.

ScaleRule.description: Machine learning model endpoint scale rule. Additional ScaleRule types may be added over time.

values.description: Machine learning model endpoint should be AlwaysOn.
Machine learning model endpoint can be scaled to zero after a period of inactivity.

FormatType.description: Format type of data. Additional Format types may be added over time.

Orientation.description: Orientation of data. Additional Orientation types may be added over time.
